title: Minidoka National Historic Site: Minidoka NHS Newsletter
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Minidoka NHS Newsletter              Minidoka Newsletter       Below are copies of the Minidoka National Historic Site's newsletter. These documents give monthly updates about what is happening at the park dealing with development, events, and administration.       May/June Newsletter March 2016 Newsletter February 2016 Newsletter January 2016 Newsletter     December 2015 NewsletterOctober/November 2015 Newsletter       January 2015 Newsletter
